response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I believe it would greatly enhance your experience and efficiency. Given its quality and features, I am confident it's worth more than what it costs others, but considering your unique value to us, I propose a special offer of $120. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product that is valued at $150 elsewhere, tailored specifically for you. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
